Letâ€™s see how to cook your chosen dish.

Ingredients

Here is what you need to have at home.

Ingredient Quantity Unit
pasta (shape of your choice) 250 g
cottage cheese 300 g
sour cream 3 tbsp
lardon 100 g

Serves: Make sure to share, and buy for your pals.

Preparation

Here are the steps to cook the meal. Takes as long as it takes. Share and enjoy!

  1. Play music in the kitchen. I recommend this playlist.
  2. Pore a glass of drink for the chef.
  3. boil the pasta for 8 minutes
  4. spread the pasta in an oven dish
  5. while the pasta is hot, spread and mix the diced shpeck or lardons with it.
  6. mix the pasta with the cottage cheese and the sour cream
  7. bake it in the oven for 20 minutes on 180 degrees.
